text: The 2009–19 Deportivo Toluca F.C. season was the 93rd season in the football club's history and the 57th consecutive season in the top flight of Mexican football. The club participated in the Apertura and Bicentenario tournaments of the Mexican Primera División and in the CONCACAF Champions League. Toluca won the Bicentenario 2010 tournament. ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:100%; width:35%;" |- ! Position !
